page.title: 10A night at Guides.
page.content: On a typical evening we arrive around 6.45 at{HAWKSWOOD HALL}to collect in subs, we pay 20p a week. Then we fall into a guide ring. Then Mrs Wilson and Mrs Martin our guide leaders come round to inspect our guide uniform. When our whole patrol has been marked out of 10 we all add our points together. We are marked for neatness and tidiness of our uniform. Our uniform is a blue skirt, blue blouse and a light blue neck tie which we keep up in place with a woggle. We wear a hat made of a stiff blue material. After guide ring we usually play a game like{ladders} which is when you form a ladder on the floor with your legs as the rungs. Then you run up and down the ladder and one side wins.
